lines.text: This is a great stew, what's in it?
Lots of things. Chicken. Corn. Green peppers. Chili.
Onions... well, it's an old recipe around here.
I don't really know, My guess is that there is some unusual element in this fragment that synchronizes with that larger mass over there and it produces some kind of energy reaction!
I wish I was kidding Mac, I'm not! Now there is an answer and I think I know what it is and it makes me sick to think about it!
But you're going to kill him with a bow and arrow?
Not with just any old bow and arrow but with this!
Johnny, you can't do it! He's your friend!
